The 25th Fangoria Chainsaw Awards is an award ceremony presented for horror films that were released in 2022. The nominees were announced on January 27, 2023. The ceremony took place on May 23, 2023.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable mw-collapsible"
! style="background:#EEDD82" | Best Wide Release
! style="background:#EEDD82" | Best Limited Release
|-

** Pearl − Directed by Ti West
** X − Directed by Ti West
|

** Resurrection − Directed by Andrew Semans
** Something in the Dirt − Directed by Justin Benson and Aaron Moorhead
** Mad God − Directed by Phil Tippett

{| class="wikitable mw-collapsible"
! style="background:#EEDD82" | Editor's Eyeball on the Future Award
|-
|Awarded new in 2023, winners were selected by the Fangoria editorial team in the spirit of looking ahead in horror. This award recognizes emerging talent in the horror space who made a significant impact in the horror industry in the last year.
|-
|INAUGURAL WINNERS
* Lauren Lavera as Sienna, Terrifier 2
* Emily Bennett and Justin Brooks, Alone with You
* Mason Thames as Finney, The Black Phone
|}
